text: Mary Help of Christians School, Inc. - Canlubang is an educational sectarian institution situated beside Don Bosco College, Canlubang in Calamba City, Laguna in the Philippines. The school is administered by the Daughters of Mary Help of Christian (Italian:Figlie di Maria Ausiliatrice or FMA), also known as Salesian Sisters of Don Bosco (FMA). ==References== Category:Schools in Calamba, Laguna
title: Mary Help of Christians College - Salesian Sisters, Inc.
